languages.text: "Можешь взять что-нибудь из нашего снаряжения. Это — моя благодарность за Злобу".
"You can take something from our stocks. Consider it my show of gratitude for disposing of Malice."
languages.original_text: "Можешь взять что-нибудь из нашего снаряжения. Это — моя благодарность за Злобу".

traits.locale_text: "You can pick something up from what we have. Consider it my show of gratitude for disposing of Malice."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “你可以从我们的库存里拿走一些东西，就当是你帮忙解决恶棍的谢礼吧。”
languages.original_text: "You can take something from our stocks. Consider it my show of gratitude for disposing of Malice."

traits.locale_text: “你可以从我们的库存里拿走一些东西，就当是你帮忙解决恶棍的谢礼吧。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「在庫から自由に持っていくといいでしょう。マリスを始末してくれたお礼だと思ってください」
languages.original_text: "You can take something from our stocks. Consider it my show of gratitude for disposing of Malice."

traits.locale_text: 「在庫から自由に持っていくといいでしょう。マリスを始末してくれたお礼だと思ってください」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Puede llevarse algo de nuestras reservas. Considérelo una muestra de gratitud por deshacerse de Malicia».
languages.original_text: "You can take something from our stocks. Consider it my show of gratitude for disposing of Malice."

traits.locale_text: «Puede llevarse algo de nuestras reservas. Considérelo una muestra de gratitud por deshacerse de Malicia».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "You can take something from our stocks. Consider it my show of gratitude for disposing of Malice."

languages.text: « Vous pouvez vous servir dans nos stocks. C'est ma façon de vous remercier de nous avoir débarrassés de Démon. »
languages.original_text: "You can take something from our stocks. Consider it my show of gratitude for disposing of Malice."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez vous servir dans nos stocks. C'est ma façon de vous remercier de nous avoir débarrassés de Démon. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Nehmt Euch etwas aus unseren Lagern. Betrachtet es als Zeichen der Dankbarkeit für die Entsorgung von Tücke."
languages.original_text: "You can take something from our stocks. Consider it my show of gratitude for disposing of Malice."

traits.locale_text: "Nehmt Euch etwas aus unseren Lagern. Betrachtet es als Zeichen der Dankbarkeit für die Entsorgung von Tücke."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Stoklarımızdan istediğini alabilirsin. Melanet'ten kurtulmana karşılık minnetimin göstergesi diyebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "You can take something from our stocks. Consider it my show of gratitude for disposing of Malice."

traits.locale_text: "Stoklarımızdan herhangi bir şeyi alabilirsin. Melanet'ten kurtulduğun için duyduğum minnetin bir ifadesi olarak gör."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
